attributes.action: Make a Law to Abolish Dual Nationality from 2020 a programe to  outlaw by 2025.
attributes.additional_details:
Nationality is different to Residence. You can be a UK National but not Resident of the UK, this is acceptable as this is regulated accordingly.

I have many times waited in the line at Boarder Control whilst people decide which Passport to use to enter this Country. I have known many people who have a UK Passport but have no intention of living here, their Children have taken UK Nationality when born overseas to a non UK National Mother who has the intention to live in the Mother's Country. When the Father is a UK National the baby has taken the Nationality for a "just in case we need it" reason only even though he does not intend to live in the UK.
attributes.background: Having more than one passport allows that person to enter this country in effect as multiple persons and may provide opportunities to take benefits in multiple countries. It also makes no sense that a single person can swear allegiance to more than one country.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "from 2020 a programe to outlaw by 2025". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
